title: The 50 most important interpretations of seeing twins in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Seeing twins in a dream Scientists interpret seeing twins in a dream in many gossip and interpretations, based on the nature of the god, male or female, married or single, and scientists also rely on the facts of seeing twins as a basis for interpretation. A person may dream of more than one twin, his death, or his miscarriage. Seeing twins in a dream indicates that the dreamer will receive some good news in the near future, as he may get married soon, or the woman may become pregnant in the next period of her life. Seeing twins in a dream requires a feeling of peace and comfort. Psychological, because this dream is evidence of halal food that will come to the dreamer, God willing. Seeing twins in a dream according to Ibn SirinIn general, seeing twins in a dream according to Ibn Sirin means that the dreamer will feel calm and comfortable in the coming period of his life, as he can get rid of the various problems and crises that It has been haunting him for a long time. The dreamer is carrying it and he must be patient with it until he is given relief from God Almighty. As for seeing twins in a dream while feeling tired, this means that the dreamer is suffering from sadness and distress in his life and that he should approach God and almost pray for relief. Seeing twins in a dream for single people may indicate an interpretation Seeing twins in a dream for an unmarried woman indicates some bad interpretations. Twins may indicate that the single person is taking some wrong paths in his life and that he should stop doing so until the situation is completely straightened out. His life. Dreaming of male and female twins may symbolize that the dreamer will not be able to achieve the emotional relationship and relationship that will follow, and God knows best. As for the dream of breastfeeding male twins, it indicates that the dreamer will fall into some problems and crises in the coming period of her life, and therefore she must be careful, and it will deteriorate. Her various friendships, because one of the close ones may decline. These problems cause her. Twins in a dream for an unmarried girl also have some good interpretations. For example, if the dream is about an unmarried woman giving birth to twins, this means that she is a good girl who wants to fulfill the duties of her religion and that she is close to God Almighty and she must continue in this way. Dreaming of triplets, it indicates the success of the girl and the expansion of her person’s livelihood, which will make her obtain a lot of money. Seeing twins in a dream for a married woman. The interpretation of seeing twins in a dream for a married woman is mainly affected by the type of twin. If a woman dreams that she has given birth to male twins, it may symbolize This is because she feels miserable, sad, and a lot of worry and worry. And that her husband will also be able to collect more money, which will make their lives easier than before. A married woman may dream of giving birth to triplets in one womb, and here twins in a dream are interpreted as an abundance of sustenance that will affect the dreamer, and as a result he should be grateful. God Almighty glorifies Him for the blessings, and in general, twins in a dream show a married woman many good and promising meanings. Seeing twins in a dream

title: Interpretation of the dream of seeing a soldier in a dream by Ibn Sirin and Imam Al-Sadiq

preview.html: Seeing a soldier in a dream is one of the good and good dreams for the dreamer, and this vision carries many meanings that bring goodness and livelihood to the person, and some different dreams and interpretations explain that the death of the soldier in the dream is obtained with evidence of the declaration of martyrdom upon his death for the sake of God. According to senior Arab scholars and jurists He interpreted the dream of a soldier in a dream. Soldiers are people who defend the rights of their country and it is a profession that everyone respects and values. Many people are confused and worried and want to know the interpretation of this dream. Interpretation of a dream about a soldier by Ibn Sirin Ibn Sirin explained that dreaming about a soldier or soldier indicates that he is a very good person. Seeing an army commander in a dream is a sign of a wise man in reality. Usually, seeing soldiers in a dream is A sign of insightful victory, kindness, and success. See also: Interpretation of a dream about seeing a military uniform in a dream by Ibn Sirin and Imam Al-Sadiq. Interpretation of a soldier’s dream for a single woman. A dream that an unmarried woman is a sign of a future husband. Seeing someone you know playing the role of a soldier in a dream means that this person is married. However, treating a stranger like a soldier in a dream shows how determined she is to maintain good morals with others. As for seeing an unmarried woman in a dream, it symbolizes that she will marry a rich, handsome man. See also: Interpretation of a dream about seeing a battle in a dream by Ibn Sirin and Al-Nabulsi Interpretation A soldier’s dream for a married woman: Seeing a married woman or a soldier in a dream shows that he is an ideal and loyal husband. In addition, seeing a soldier marrying a married woman indicates that he is a good husband and has a good moral character. See also: Interpretation of a dream about seeing an army in a dream for a man. Interpretation of a soldier’s dream for a man: Seeing a soldier In a man’s dream, there is evidence of changes in his life. He must pay attention to that. Seeing a soldier carrying a gun in a man’s dream proves that he has something to protect. As for seeing a man in a dream as if he is wearing a military uniform in a dream, this proves that the dreamer is dealing with many things in his life. Seeing the dreamer fighting in a war suggests that he is entering into a psychological war, which will have a positive reaction on the personality of the observer. The dreamer’s vision that he cannot pass the military exam proves that he is unwilling to enter the world. The dreamer’s vision is of passing the military college exams, which indicates that he He bears responsibility and can actually carry it out. To see that the dreamer is seen wearing a military uniform while performing some military parade, means that he has been honored in the position of director. To see that the dreamer, as if he has achieved rank and decency, proves that he will indeed receive honors The great. Soldiers and soldiers in a dream. Whoever sees in his dream that he has become a soldier and that he is in the chair of the ruler or the president and has eaten from his food, then his dreams herald that he will obtain a high position and position. And the person who sees soldiers in a dream shows that he will achieve what he wants, and it also shows that he is a responsible person. It may indicate Seeing soldiers indicates the dreamer's need for friends and acquaintances in his life. Escaping from soldiers in a dream is a sign of seeing

title: Learn about the interpretation of blood coming out of the mouth in a dream by Ibn Sirin and the interpretation of a dream of blood coming out of the mouth.

preview.html: Blood coming out of the mouth in a dream. Some people are terrified when they see blood coming out of the mouth in a dream and they want to know the interpretation to be sure of the meaning conveyed by this vision, but the meaning varies depending on the nature of the dream and the condition of the dreamer, and here are the full details of the interpretation of the dream according to the opinions of Ibn Sirin and the leading interpretation scholars.Blood Coming out of the mouth in a dream. The interpretation of the dream is that blood coming out of the mouth indicates the end of a difficult period in the dreamer’s life of trials and tribulations, and this experience may be on a material level, such that he is almost at ease or comes to his social life, the circumstances of his family and his relationships with those around him are stable, as Blood from the mouth in a dream symbolizes the renewal of energy and getting rid of negativity. Most interpreters believe that whoever dreams of a nosebleed in a dream should protect himself regularly with legal ruqyah. Because it could be a sign of envy and hatred that fills the souls of some of those around the fortuneteller, and this dream sometimes expresses the psychological disorder that the fortuneteller suffers from in reality, but it portends him to recover soon and return to normal, Zoe. Blood coming out of the mouth in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin believes that blood coming out of the mouth in a dream expresses the dreamer’s injustice towards the person if the bleeding is not accompanied by a feeling of pain and that this person feels extremely wronged and wants to avenge himself at the first opportunity, but when he feels pain, the evidence is... On wrong decisions that only accept stubbornness and arrogance, regardless of their consequences, and sometimes it indicates false testimony that the fortuneteller said against some. The amount of blood that comes in a dream also carries an indication in the interpretation. Blood coming out of the mouth in small quantities means the end of the torment that the dreamer is going through soon and the end of his worries, but if it is in large quantities, it shows the difficulties and trials that the dreamer will face during the coming period and he needs God’s help and patience, and when blood flows from the mouth to his hand, this is a sign of... Graft.Still not finding what you are looking for? Log in from Google to the dream interpretation website and see everything that interests you. Interpretation of a dream of urinating blood for a single woman. Interpretation of a dream of urinating blood for an unmarried woman, this indicates that she will face many obstacles and crises in her life. Watching an unmarried woman see herself urinating blood in a dream in Pigeons mean that she is always seeking to earn a lot of money, but through illegal means, and she must pay attention to this matter and stop it. If an unmarried girl sees her blood urinating in a dream, this is a sign that she has committed some sins, disobedience, and reprehensible acts that do not please God Almighty, and she must You care about this matter, stop it, and rush to repent. Once it is too late for him not to fall into her hands until death, repentance, and a difficult reckoning. Interpretation of blood coming out of the vulva for married people. Interpretation of blood that came out of a dream for a married woman, and that blood is corrupt. This indicates that he will get rid of all the bad events that he faces. This also describes that Almighty God will provide

title: Interpretation of the dream of threads in a dream by Ibn Sirin and Al-Nabulsi

preview.html: I like it Fans Subscribers Fans Interpretation of dreams about fibers in a dream by Ibn Sirin and al-Nabulsi. Fibers are one of the tools used in the bathroom. They help clean the body well. There are other types of fibers used in washing plates and dishes, but they differ in the shape and type of swimming fibers, and since fibers are not free of That is, a house, seeing it in a dream leaves behind many questions, because the dreamer wants to know the interpretation of the dream about fibers in detail, why it is one of those dreams that indicate many things and has many symbols. Interpretation of the dream about fibers by Ibn Sirin. Fibers in a dream may indicate problems. The dreamer will fall into it. Seeing fibers in a dream may indicate the failure of projects that the dreamer plans to design. Fibers in a dream may indicate diseases that the dreamer is exposed to and some friends are betrayed by them. Seeing a loofah pillow is a sign of a problem that the dreamer will soon get rid of. The fiber quilt indicates On the psychological crises that the viewer is exposed to as a result of the failure of romantic relationships. Interpretation of a dream about Nabulsi in a dream: Seeing white fibers inside the dream is evidence of success and the end of all family disputes that the dreamer is experiencing. Cotton fibers in a dream are evidence that the dreamer is a person who acts rationally. Fibers in a dream indicate abundance Of money. Seeing a body massage with fibers in a dream is a sign of good luck and an opening to earn a living. Bathing with fibers shows a way out of an economic crisis. Interpretation of a dream about human fibers. Seeing a palm tree in a dream is evidence of clothing and food. Seeing a man in a dream bathing with fibers is evidence of... The disappearance of worries and problems that the dreamer is in. A patient’s fiber bath is evidence of a cure for the disease. The fibers present in a debtor’s dream are evidence that this debt will be paid soon. Interpretation of a dream of fibers for a person. If a girl sees in a dream that she is bathing with fibers, this is an indication of the good condition of that person. Girl. If he sees in a dream that he is bathing with fibers and clothes, this is a sign of marriage soon. Seeing fibers in the dream of an unmarried woman, where she bathed with her fiancé, is a sign of a successful marriage. Interpretation of a married woman’s dream about bathing with fibers in a dream Married Be a guide to getting rid of the problems she is going through Seeing yourself drowning in fibers in a dream in front of people is an indication of the happiness and joy that this woman is experiencing. Seeing a shower of fibers without clothes is an annoying sight for a married woman. Interpretation of a pregnant woman’s dream: Bathing with a loofah and soap in a pregnant woman’s dream is evidence of loyalty and love between her and her husband. Fiber in pregnant women is evidence of a new life and a possible birth. A palm tree in a dream can indicate clothing and food that the woman will receive. Add the dream you want to interpret in a comment below the article and we will respond to it and clarify it.

title: Interpretation of seeing the color blue in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing the color blue in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Learn about the interpretation of seeing the color blue in a dream by Ibn Sirin for both the single, married and male. What the dream expresses is what constantly occupies our minds, and it is a belief that seeing the color dark blue in a dream indicates that there will soon be a phase. Transitional and we will find out in our article today. Interpretation of seeing the color blue in a dream by Ibn Sirin: Seeing a dark blue color in a dream. It shows that there will soon be a transitional phase and the dreamer will witness a change in his life by traveling, moving to another place, or traveling to work and study soon. Seeing indigo blue in a dream. It announces the dreamer’s closeness to God Almighty, and that his soul is pure and his intention is pure. Seeing the light blue color in a dream. It indicates the extent of psychological stability, enjoying strong psychological health and feeling happy most of the time. Blue clothes indicate distress and bad news. Interpretation of seeing the color blue in a dream for a single woman. Their visions and interpretations vary according to the degree of blue color that the girl sees, and we explain this as follows: If she sees... An unmarried girl dreams of a bouquet of blue roses. This indicates that he is in a happy relationship that will soon end in marriage. Also, seeing shades of blue indicates success, whether in business, studies, or trade. If a girl sees in her dream that she is wearing a blue veil. This indicates a pious, virtuous, kind, and pure girl. If an unmarried girl sees that she is wearing a blue dress, this indicates a happy and good change in her life and that she will soon marry a suitable person. Seeing a girl wearing an elaborate blue dress indicates the extent of peace and security. And the calmness that the girl enjoys, as well as the calmness of her life and the activity that she enjoys. If an unmarried girl sees a shade of blue “the color of the sky,” this indicates that this girl thinks a lot about how to make money and that she will have the abundant money that God gives her. It shows The color blue also brings this girl closer to travel or her proximity to goodness or success in work and study. Seeing the color blue in a dream for a single girl also means that she will join one of the jobs she wants. Interpretation of seeing the color blue in a dream for a married woman. The color blue is a degree of blue and the color Blue in general has some interpretations related to its different shades. The following is an explanation of the interpretation of the color blue in a married woman’s dream: If a married woman sees while standing in her dream that her husband is wearing blue clothes, this means that her husband will reach a high position in his work and a prominent position and that he will enjoy abundant money. If a married woman sees the color blue on the walls of the house; This indicates that goodness will come to her and her family. If a married woman sees home furniture, the covers and curtains are blue. This indicates the arrival of a lot of goods, food, and money to its people. If a married woman sees the color blue in her dream. It expresses the calm and stability experienced by her family

Seeing a girl wearing an elaborate blue dress indicates the extent of peace and security. And the calmness that the girl enjoys, as well as the calmness of her life and the activity that she enjoys. If an unmarried girl sees a shade of blue “the color of the sky,” this indicates that this girl thinks a lot about how to make money and that she will have the abundant money that God gives her. It shows The color blue also brings this girl closer to travel or her proximity to goodness or success in work and study. Seeing the color blue in a dream for a single girl also means that she will join one of the jobs she wants. Interpretation of seeing the color blue in a dream for a married woman. The color blue is a degree of blue and the color Blue in general has some interpretations related to its different shades. The following is an explanation of the interpretation of the color blue in a married woman’s dream: If a married woman sees while standing in her dream that her husband is wearing blue clothes, this means that her husband will reach a high position in his work and a prominent position and that he will enjoy abundant money. If a married woman sees the color blue on the walls of the house; This indicates that goodness will come to her and her family. If a married woman sees home furniture, the covers and curtains are blue. This indicates the arrival of a lot of goods, food, and money to its people. If a married woman sees the color blue in her dream. It expresses the calm and stability experienced by her family

title: What is the interpretation of seeing gunshots in a dream for senior scholars?

preview.html: What you do not know about seeing shots in a dream: Seeing yourself shooting in a dream is one of the dreams that many people experience and which causes panic and anxiety to its owner. This is because it is one of their wondrous visions, and it has many interpretations narrated by hermeneutic scholars, which vary between good and evil and vary according to the condition of the dreamer. In the following lines we respond: Examine whether you have a set of evidence about seeing him in a dream, whether it was a man or a woman. Interpretation of shooting a gun in a dream for a man: Seeing someone shooting at him in a dream symbolizes the presence of many enemies in the dreamer’s life and indicates that some people are chasing him, especially when the dreamer does not see his blood flowing after this shot that an enemy is waiting to attack him, and God knows best. Interpretation of shooting when you see a group From people trying to attack him, this is evidence of evading illicit money, or adhering to good principles and morals and staying away from taboos. If he sees that his leg has been injured as a result of being shot, this is an indication that he left the country in which he lives and immigrated to another place, to earn money. Halal and the search for a change in the material and living standard. Google the Egyptian dream interpretation website and you will find all the interpretations of dreams that you are looking for. Interpretation of seeing gunfire in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin interprets the dreamer’s vision of gunfire in a dream as a sign of his ability to solve the problems he faced in the dream. His life in the previous period, and he will be more comfortable after that. If one sees in his dream that he is shooting, this is a sign that he will get a lot of money that will make him pay off the debts that he has accumulated for a long time. If the dreamer watches the reception during his sleep, this expresses His ability to overcome the obstacles that prevented him from achieving his goals, and the way will open for him to achieve his goal. Seeing the dreamer shooting gunshots in a dream symbolizes the good events that will occur around him and will contribute to improving his psychological state very significantly. If one sees gunshots in his dream, this is a sign However, he is recovering from a health problem that he faced in his life in the previous period, and his condition will gradually improve in the coming days. Interpretation of shooting in a dream for a married woman: For a married woman who sees in her dream that someone is shooting at her, and the bullet hit her hands and she saw blood falling on them, this is a symbol of her obtaining an inheritance. Big and abundant money, after the death of one of her relatives. , in the near future. Live bullets in a dream for a married woman. Seeing a married woman in a dream dodging bullets indicates that she will be able to overcome many things that upset her very much and will be more comfortable in the coming days. If the dreamer sees during her sleep that she is dodging bullets, then this A sign that she repaired the relationship with her husband after a long period of disagreements that occurred between them for a long time. In the event that the dreamer sees in her dream that she is running away from bullets, this represents her salvation from the false people who surrounded her and caused her misfortune.

title: Seeing the grave of the Prophet in a dream

preview.html: The translators emphasized that seeing this dream is real, and an indication that the dreamer follows and preserves the Sunnah of the Messenger, may God bless him and grant him peace. It may indicate the extent of the dreamer’s desire to visit the Sacred House of God and the Mosque of the Messenger of God, may God bless him and grant him peace. Interpretation of seeing the grave of the Prophet in a dream. It is said that seeing a dream of the grave of the Prophet in a dream. It is also one of the desirable and praiseworthy visions that a person can see in all his dreams. It is also said: Seeing the grave of the Prophet in a dream. It may be evidence that God Almighty will bless the dreamer with a lot of sustenance, blessings, and goodness. Commentators narrated that seeing a dream of the grave of the Prophet in a dream. It could be evidence that the fortuneteller will receive a large number of girls and boys. Likewise. He saw a dream about the Prophet’s grave in a dream, and he went to visit it and saw water coming out of it. This is evidence that the monarch is a pious and righteous person who desires to perform acts of worship and duties. Seeing the Prophet’s grave in a dream indicates that he traveled to it with the intention of visiting it. The dreamer is fully prepared to implement the Sunnah. The Messenger of God, may God bless him and grant him peace, and always act upon it. Seeing the Prophet’s grave in a dream symbolizes: The dreamer is one who fears God Almighty and does not commit sins and prohibitions because he fears torment in the afterlife. See also: Interpretation of seeing the Prophet in a dream and its meaning by Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of the dream of the Prophet’s grave in The dream and its meaning. Translators say that seeing the grave of the Prophet in a dream. It may be an indication that the dreamer often prays to the Messenger of God, may God bless him and grant him peace, and that his prayer reaches the Messenger. It is said that seeing the grave of the Prophet in a dream was his business. This could be a sign that the fortuneteller He will receive a lot of money and benefits in return from this trade. It is also said: Seeing the grave of the Messenger in a dream and suffering from illness. This may be a sign that God Almighty will soon bless the dreamer with recovery from this illness that caused him suffering. If you dream of the grave of the Messenger in a dream And the dreamer was crying, this indicates that worries and anxiety have died and he enjoys comfort, health and happiness in his life. Interpretation of seeing the Prophet’s grave in a dream by Ibn Sirin Ibn Sirin narrated that seeing the Prophet’s grave in a dream. This may be a sign that the dreamer will go to perform Hajj in the near future. He also indicated Until seeing the grave of the Prophet in a dream. It could be evidence that the dreamer will succeed in achieving all his goals and dreams that he has always sought. To dream of the grave of the Prophet in a dream indicates this. That God Almighty will bless the dreamer with his good and righteous children when he grows old. The vision of the Prophet in a dream indicates this. The dream of the Prophet’s grave in a dream about a young man. He will marry a girl with good morals and religion. Also, the dream of the Prophet’s grave in a dream symbolizes: The dreamer believes in God Almighty and the Last Day, and also follows the Sunnah of the Messenger, may God bless him and grant him peace, and loves him with a great love. Ibn Sirin says that Seeing the grave of the Prophet in a dream. This is evidence of the Messenger refraining from committing sins and transgressions, to follow the Sunnah of the Messenger, may God bless him and grant him peace, who forbade approaching them or doing what they did. It was also narrated that seeing the grave of the Prophet in the dream

title: Interpretation of seeing my dead brother in a dream and its meaning

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing my deceased brother in a dream. It is worth noting that visions and dreams in reality are nothing but scenes dictated by the subconscious mind during the dream. A person who sees, for example, sees brothers in a dream, so in this article we will discuss the interpretation of seeing a dead brother in a dream. Interpretation of seeing a dead brother in a dream by Ibn SirinSeeing a dead brother is considered one of the important visions, in addition to carrying signals, warnings, and indications, from the point of view of the translator Ibn Sirin. And this interpretation is as follows: In general, Ibn Sirin believes that seeing a dead brother in a dream is an indication of the difficult circumstances that the dreamer is going through. Based on this vision, the dreamer needs support, support, and assistance. In addition, seeing a dead brother in A dream can definitely indicate the need for this brother to pray and give alms. In the same context, if the dreamer sees that his brother is sick in his sleep. There is no doubt that this vision indicates the need for the deceased brother to give alms for his soul, as well as pray for him. If the dreamer sees in The dream is that he is bidding farewell to his deceased brother, then this is considered a sign that the dreamer is moving away from his plans. However, if a person sees in a dream that he is visiting his brother’s grave, then it indicates the person’s kindness to his brother and his piety towards him. If the dreamer sees himself taking something from his dead brother in the dream, this may indicate To a decrease in his livelihood. On the other hand, if the dreamer gives to his brother in a dream, this indicates comfort and livelihood. It is certain that seeing a deceased brother in a dream wearing new clothes indicates a good life in the afterlife. Conversely, if the dead brother’s clothes are dirty, This indicates many sins and transgressions. Interpretation of seeing a dead brother in a dream. See also: Ibn Sirin’s interpretation of seeing a dead mother in a dream. Interpretation of seeing a dead brother in a dream for a single woman. Certainly, a girl can be greatly affected by the loss of a relative of hers, such as her brother, for example. If An unmarried girl saw her dead brother in her dream, this indicates her need for protection and protection. What if that girl saw her brother smiling at her in a dream. The evidence for this is that the things they abandoned will ease. In addition, if an unmarried girl sees in her dream that she is hugging Her deceased brother. This definitely indicates longing and nostalgia for him. Moreover, if an unmarried woman sees herself kissing her brother in her dream, this may indicate his good behavior. Perhaps an unmarried woman walking in a dream with her deceased brother indicates the behavior of this The girl is like her brother. But if an unmarried woman sees that her dead brother has visited her in a dream, the vision indicates that she will gain security and trust. Interpretation of seeing my dead brother in a dream. See also: Al-Nabulsi’s interpretation of seeing a dead father or dead father in a dream. Interpretation of a dream of a dead brother for a married woman. It is well-known. Seeing dead people in dreams is scary and disturbing, but some of them carry good news. A married woman seeing her deceased brother in a dream has the following interpretation: Seeing a deceased brother in a married woman’s dream indicates...

title: What is the interpretation of pregnancy in a dream, especially according to Ibn Sirin?

preview.html: Ibn Sirin’s interpretation of pregnancy in a dream: The moment of pregnancy is the expected moment in a woman’s life when feelings of motherhood begin to grow in her heart until the fetus is born, but dreams are a different thing. Some of them see seeing a pregnancy as annoying, and others consider it praiseworthy. Through the following lines, we will know when it will be a good vision and when it will not be good? Interpretation of pregnancy dreams: A divorced woman’s dream that she is pregnant is evidence of the coming of happy and fulfilling days in her life. When a married woman sees in her dream that she is pregnant, and she was already the mother of more than one child, this vision is worthy of Praise and show the goodness that a married woman will enjoy in the near future, and this vision shows the end of the quarrels that occurred between the mother and her husband. The dream of twins is a lot of sustenance, whether for a married or single woman, but there must be a girl in the twins, that is, it is a good vision For a girl to know that she is pregnant with twins or a boy and a girl, but if the pregnancy is with male twins, this means difficulties and challenges that the dreamer will fall into. A long period of his life, but these challenges will be overcome by the dreamer - God willing. When a man dreams that he is pregnant, this indicates the difficulty of the life he lives, and it also shows his struggle and strength to bear this difficult life. If the single man sees that she is pregnant and gives birth to the child, then he feels With relief, this is evidence that he is now living in a big problem, but God will relieve him of his distress and this problem will be solved soon. When an unmarried woman who has a twin sister in reality sees that she and her sister are pregnant in a dream, and they were at the height of happiness, this means that two little brothers They will get married in reality and live a happy life full of joy and happiness. If a sick person dreams that she is pregnant in the ninth month, this vision is great news that indicates the end of the period of fatigue and illness, and the dreamer will live a life full of health and luxury in the coming days. . His life. If an unemployed young man sees that he is pregnant with a girl in a dream, this is evidence that goodness will come to him and he will work and earn a lot of lawful and blessed money from this work in the near future. Interpretation of pregnancy for a single woman: If an unmarried fiancée sees that her marriage has been completed and she becomes pregnant If the pregnancy was in the first months, this is evidence that the beginning of her life with her husband will be full of problems, but they will succeed in overcoming these problems. Seeing a single pregnancy in a dream is evidence of the great hardship and fatigue that she is suffering from. Because she took on many responsibilities that drained her energy. The happiness of an unmarried woman with pregnancy in a dream indicates the arrival of goodness and the happy life that the unmarried woman will live after suffering and long waiting. Interpretation of a dream about pregnancy for a girl: If a young woman sees herself in a dream that she is pregnant, then this Visibility is not good. Because it guarantees that this girl’s life will be very difficult and full of problems. If this girl is on her way to exam days and sees in a dream that she is pregnant and very tired from this pregnancy, then this is evidence
